Event Organization

Some Schools, Workshops & Conferences I helped to organize

  • OQS2025 Open Quantum Systems and Mesoscopic Physics, Vierumäki, Finland 8-12 December 2025,
  • OQS2023 Open Quantum Systems and Mesoscopic Physics, Hyytiälä Forest Station, Finland June 4-9 2023.
  • Math-Phys seminar series Department of Mathematics & Statistics, University of Helsinki, from 2006.
  • AtMath 2021 Zoom-Workshop, online-event, October 9 2020.
  • AtMath Himos 2020 Workshop, Himos, Finland, January 20-24 2020.
  • EQS2019: Summer School on Engineered Quantum Systems, Helsinki, Finland, 28-30 June 2019.
  • AtMath Hyytiälä 2018 Workshop, Hyytiälä Forestry Field Station, 26-28 September, 2018.
  • AtMath Kick-off conference, Levi, Finland, November 20-24, 2017.
  • Graduate Arctic School on Open Quantum Systems, Kevo, Finalnd September 10-15, 2017.
  • Conference From Field Theory to Non-Equilibrium, in honour of Krzysztof Gawędzki on the occasion of his 70th birthday, June 19-21, 2017, Nice, France
  • Graduate Arctic School on Open Quantum Systems, Kilpisjärvi Finland, December 14-18, 2015.
  • Conference Mathematics meets Physics, Helsinki June 24-27, 2014.
  • Workshop Networks and Algorithms: complexity in Mathematics, Physics and Computer Science Helsinki, June 16 - 19, 2005.
